meanings.definition: Members of the biological family Hominidae, which includes humans and their ancestors.
meanings.sent1: Hominins are part of the same family as humans.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study hominins to learn about our ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The hominins had a family reunion to trace their roots.
meanings.sent4: In the tree of life, hominins are a branch close to humans.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased the evolution of hominins.

meanings.definition: Any of the extinct species of early humans that are more closely related to modern humans than to chimpanzees.
meanings.sent1: Researchers discovered new hominins fossils in Africa.
meanings.sent2: The hominins' tools showed their intelligence and skills.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, someone dressed up as a hominins ancestor.
meanings.sent4: The hominins' footsteps echoed through the ancient cave.
meanings.sent5: The documentary explored the lives of early hominins.
